name: Defiance & Mr. Good Looking - Alpha
description:
Defiance and Mr. Good Looking is a fast-paced single player FPS where you play as the titular characters (almost) at the same time.

  • Mr. Good Looking: Can use ranged weapons found in the levels.
  • Defiance: Uses the Ximira blade and can learn special attacks from scrolls.

With these completely different set of status and weapons work together (with yourself) to defeat enemies in 4 levels.

Inspired by retro FPS (specially Blood) and some new classics (such as Doom: Eternal and Dusk) you can expect:

  • Fast-Paced action (eventually);
  • Gibbs (mostly mechanical parts)
  • Health and ammo management through character switching;
  • Less linear levels;
  • Secrets;
  • Lore that you can easily ignore;

In this free alpha you get access to the first 4 levels, if this project interest you even a bit consider donating here to support the development, because god knows that i need support to finish this
